CustomString04.HelpMessage: Custom String 04 must have a value, or 'n/a' if not applicable.

CustomString05.Description: Packaging target OS that failed (e.g. blue, rs5)
CustomString05.HelpMessage: Custom String 05 must have a value, or 'n/a' if not applicable.

CustomString06.Description: Architecture machine was trying to process (e.g. x86)
CustomString06.HelpMessage: Custom String 06 must have a value, or 'n/a' if not applicable.

CustomString07.Description: Field consisting of specific value, or 'n/a' if not applicable
CustomString07.HelpMessage: Must be one of the following categories: 'WTTManual', 'DiskSpace', 'NoHeartBeat', 'LostDrive', or 'n/a'

Cost.Description: Cost, in hours, of the work item.
Cost.HelpMessage: Cost must have a value indicating number of hours (i.e. 0.25, 1.5, 3.0, etc.)
